text: Samuel Henry Cartledge (1882 – 16 January 1938) was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper. ==References== Category:1882 births Category:1938 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Grimsby St John's F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Queens Park Rangers F.C. players Category:Worksop Town F.C. players Category:Grimsby Rangers F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Sam Cartledge
